properties.description: This pipeline does snowflake a extraction for given application and dataset group and Copy to database

activities.name: LU-Metadata
activities.description: This activity pulls the details related to application_name and dataset_group from orchestration_metadata.

sqlReaderQuery.value:
select
    om.application_name,
    om.dataset_name,
    om.dataset_group,
    om.server_name,
    om.server_path as source_object_type,
    om.filename as dso_changelog_table,
    om.data_filename,
    om.container_name,
    om.archival_blob_name,
    om.stage_blob_name,
    om.blob_trigger_name,
    om.data_level,
    om.active_ind,
    om.parent_id,
	om.parameter_json,
	engg.adf_trigger_name,
	engg.base_table_name,
engg.extract_blob_location,
engg.extract_file_name,
cnt.table_name,
	case
      when om.server_name = 'LS_APAC_CN_DATALAKE_SQL' then 'khcde-kv-sec-china-df-datalake-export-sql-conn-string'
      when om.server_name = 'LS_APAC_SNOWFLAKESTAGING_SQL' then 'khcde-kv-sec-indo-df-snowflakestaging-sql-conn-string'
      when om.server_name = 'LS_ANZ_PROFIT_SQL' then 'khcde-kv-sec-anz-profit-in-sql-conn-string'
      when om.server_name = 'LS_APAC_EXPORT_SQL' then 'khcde-kv-sec-apac-anz-irisfkinbnd-sql-conn-string'
	END AS key_vault_secret_name
from dbo.khc_orchestration_metadata om
inner join dbo.khc_enggextract_metadata engg
on om.parent_id=engg.parent_id
left join dbo.khc_data_extract_control_table cnt
on om.parent_id = cnt.parent_id
    where om.application_name in ('@{pipeline().parameters.application_name}')
and om.dataset_group in ('@{pipeline().parameters.dataset_group}')
  and om.data_level >=2 and om.active_ind='y'

activities.name: SP-PipelineStart
activities.description: This Activity logs starting of pipeline in khc_audit_log table.

activities.name: IS_Metadata_Valid
activities.description: Checks whether the Input combination given to Pipeline is valid or not.

ifTrueActivities.name: SP-ActivitySuccess01
ifTrueActivities.description: This activity logs success of IS_Metadata_Valid activity in khc_audit_log_detail table.

activities.name: WB-SendSuccessEmail
activities.description: Send email notification upon successfull completion of pipeline

activities.name: SP-ActivityFailed02
activities.description: This activity logs failure of LU-Metadata activity in khc_audit_log_detail table and failure of pipeline in  khc_audit_log table.

activities.name: ForEach_Row
activities.description: For each entry in metadata runs snowflake extraction and copy data to SQL database

activities.name: SP-ActivityFailed03
activities.description: This activity logs failure of Snowflake Extraction activity in khc_audit_log_detail table and failure of pipeline in  khc_audit_log table.

activities.name: WB-SendFailureEmail03
activities.description: Send email notification upon Snowflake extraction failure

body.value:
{         "to_email": "@{variables('emailTo')}",         "subject": "Failed during Snowflake Ingestion : @{pipeline().parameters.Application_Name} - @{activity('LU-Metadata').output.value[0].dataset_group}",         "body": "Dear All,

The cloud analytics data load process failed for the Application: @{pipeline().parameters.Application_Name}
Please find below the details:

Pipeline Name: @{pipeline().Pipeline}
Pipeline Run ID: @{pipeline().RunId}
Pipeline Trigger Name: @{pipeline().TriggerName}
Pipeline Trigger Type: @{pipeline().TriggerType}
Pipeline Start Time: @{pipeline().TriggerTime}
Activity: Copy_Snowflake_to_SQL

Parameters:
===========
Application Name: @{pipeline().parameters.Application_Name}
Blob Trigger: @{pipeline().parameters.dataset_group}

Error Code: @{activity('EP-SnowflakeExtraction').Error.errorCode}
Error Message: @{activity('EP-SnowflakeExtraction').Error.message}

Please take care.

Regards,
Cloud Analytics Team",         "importance": "High" }
